name: The Squeel of Time
description:
Vote for game here:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/the-squeel-of-time

Once upon a time, there was a magical pig who could slow-down time. Rumor has it, this pig could even cross a chasm filled with flowing lava. But the important question is, why did the pig cross the chasm?

We still haven’t figured that out yet.

Created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 50 game jam.
